author: alexfig8
title: Nice set
review:
I bought this set years ago at the lego store at disney world.  It is one of the coolest sets ever!

Pros

  • Very cool tires and they are useful for MOCS
  • The ramp is good for any racers car
  • The barracades are useful
  • good for stop-motion animations

Cons

  • Hard to find
  • It would be nice to get maybe an exclusive tiny turbo
  • The monster tires require bigger wheels which are kinda rare


Overall, this is a great set and I would highly recommend dit to a racers fan.  However it is kinda rare.  I rate this set a 4.8.
